meanings.definition: A reproduction of a printed work.
meanings.sent1: I bought a reprints of my favorite book to give as a gift.
meanings.sent2: The library had many reprints of classic novels available for borrowing.
meanings.sent3: The teacher showed us a reprints of the historical document, but it was in color!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a reprints of a beautiful painting, clear and detailed.
meanings.sent5: The reprints of the map made it easier to navigate through the city.

meanings.definition: To produce a new copy of a printed work.
meanings.sent1: The publisher reprints the best-selling book to meet the high demand.
meanings.sent2: She reprints the photograph to give each family member a copy.
meanings.sent3: The copier machine reprints the document perfectly this time.
meanings.sent4: His mind constantly reprints memories of their time together.
meanings.sent5: The artist reprints the painting to sell more copies at the art fair.
